channel.name: Ignore Pain (Champ card) - Daily Discussion 27 May

messages.content: Previous Daily Discussion: #deleted-channel

Next Daily Discussion: #deleted-channel

__Votes__:
Twin Slam (Guardian card): 2
Unlimited Rolls (Snecko card): 0
Spiker Protocol (Guardian card): 1
Daily Discussion 220/784

embeds.title: Ignore Pain
embeds.description:
Rare Skill / 2 (1) :energy_champ: / The Champ / Downfall

Your HP cannot be reduced until your next turn.
**Exhaust**.

messages.content:
"Intangible is the most powerful effect in the game"
Ignore pain:
When i saw this i was immediately taken aback that it does not cost 3(2)
Its just alternative <Vault> that can sometimes be better

embeds.title: Vault
embeds.description:
Rare Skill / 3 (2) :purple_energy: / The Watcher / Slay the Spire

Take an extra turn after this one.
End your turn.
**Exhaust**.

messages.content: but sometimes worse
I honestly don't know why this doesn't cost 3(2) now either
iirc it used to fatigue you but fatigue got removed
What did fatigue do?
lose this much hp right now, heal it back at end of combat
champ used to be entirely based around fatigue
That sounds gimmicky
Like err [[Aspiration]]

embeds.title: Aspiration
embeds.description:
Rare Skill / 0 :colorless_energy: / Ego / Ruina

**Ethereal**.
**Innate**.
Gain 3 (4) **Strength** :p_strength:.
Lose 10 HP. At the end of combat, heal the HP lost by this card.

messages.content:
btw:
you could not fatigue yourself to death

yes
this is basically "fatigue 10"
except that you can commit suicide with this card
You can also use it with <Magic Flower> to turn it into self repair

embeds.title: Magic Flower
embeds.description:
Rare Relic / The Ironclad / Slay the Spire

Healing is 50% more effective during combat.
*A flower long thought extinct, somehow preserved in perfect condition.*

messages.content: But anyway, Vault-ish but 1 less cost kinda wack
or you interpret this as an apparition
I know you dont get *as much* out of it, but still too strong
in which case it is still wack
What if ignore pain had an on pickup effect to obtain <pain>
LMAO

embeds.title: Pain
embeds.description:
Curse / Slay the Spire

**Unplayable**.
While in hand,
lose 1 HP whenever you play another card.

messages.content: so like [[saved by the bell]]?

embeds.title: Saved by the Bell
embeds.description:
Rare Skill / 2 (1) :colorless_energy: / The Packmaster / Pack: Bellord

**Retain**.
Gain 1 **Intangible** :p_intangible:.
**Exhaust**.
**Pickup:** Obtain 2 **Curse**s of the Bell.

messages.content: Yes except not bad design

what's worse:
One pain, or 2 bing bong curses?
the pain can be removed, the bing bongs are forever
bellord in general is turbo jank

It's insane, you take it whenever you see it. There's really nothing else to say, I guess sometimes if you need a different effect at rare you don't take it (sometimes champ desperately needs the scaling from gladiator form, or the offensive scaling of strike of genius). This is a very strong purchase if you see it at a shop, likely worth the 200+ souls

Closest comparisons I can think of are apparition and shape of puddle. Like shape of pudle, this probably should cost 3 (upgrade to 2). Very strong with runic pyramid, can be cute with strange spoon (and champ has a decent number of other cards that pair well with spoon like gut punch).
<shape of puddle>

embeds.title: Shape of Puddle
embeds.description:
Rare Skill / 3 (2) :energy_slime: / The Slime Boss / Downfall

Gain 1 **Intangible** :p_intangible:.
**Exhaust**.

messages.content: yeah this is basically shape of puddle but cheaper
which is odd

btw sandtag:
playing shape of puddle does a funny
I saw shape of puddle and concluded i would never pick it if it was not pre upgraded
did you at least get to see the funny with shape of puddle at least?
<cheap shot> also a close comparison, better in anything but bosses

embeds.title: Cheap Shot
embeds.description:
Rare Attack / 2 (1) :energy_champ: / The Champ / Downfall

Deal 5 damage.
If the enemy is a Boss, deal damage two more times. If not, **Stun** it.
**Exhaust**.

messages.content: aoe fights as well
cheap shot doesn't help as much when you fight triple slavers for example lol
oh yeah those

I mean, shape of puddle is pretty good even when not upgraded. Plenty of turns require that you block large attacks, and shape of puddle works very well on those turns. It also works nicely with runic pyramid, and slime boss can have his slime minions deal damage even on turns where you spend most of your energy blocking. You can even heal back the chip damage with your starter relic.
intangible but you don't even take 1 damage and it doesn't even have ethereal. Perfectly balanced
<fatigue>

embeds.title: Fatigue
embeds.description:
Keyword / Downfall

Lose HP. Restore Fatigued HP at the end of combat. You won't die from Fatigue .

messages.content: how?

basically:
For Champ, every 10 fatigue he got gave him 1 strength
If the fatigue debuff was removed, he lost the strength
EXCEPT by Berserker finisher
which cleared fatigue without clearing strength
Berserker stance skill bonus used to be gaining fatigue
i miss gladiator stance 😔

Imagine having to pay 3 to cast Vault

This post brought to you by The Champ gang
